name: Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30 | 12-Hour Stunning Matte Finish | Top 5 Benefits
description:
Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30: The Ultimate Long-Lasting Lip Color

Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30 delivers extraordinary color intensity with a lightweight, comfortable feel that beauty enthusiasts crave. This premium lip paint offers a stunning matte finish that stays put throughout your day, whether you're in back-to-back meetings or enjoying evening cocktails. 💋

The velvety formula of Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30 glides on smoothly, providing full coverage in just one swipe. Unlike traditional matte lipsticks that can leave your lips feeling dry and cracked, this innovative lip paint contains hydrating ingredients that keep your lips comfortable for hours on end.

Product Information

Size 5ml
Shade N 30 - Rich Mauve
Product Type Lip Paint
Finish Extreme Matte
Brand Name Instyle

Key Features of Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30

  • ✨ Ultra-pigmented formula for vibrant color payoff
  • ⏱️ Long-lasting wear up to 12 hours
  • 🌿 Enriched with vitamin E and jojoba oil for lip nourishment
  • 🚫 Transfer-proof and smudge-resistant
  • 🌱 Cruelty-free and vegan-friendly formulation

The Perfect Application Technique

For flawless application of your Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30, start by exfoliating your lips with a gentle scrub. Apply a thin layer of lip balm and let it absorb. Using the precision applicator, outline your lips starting from the cupid's bow, then fill in with the rich pigment. Allow 30 seconds to dry completely for maximum longevity.

The N 30 shade offers a sophisticated mauve tone that complements a wide range of skin tones, making it a versatile addition to your makeup collection. Pair it with our Instyle Precision Lip Liner for a perfectly defined pout that lasts all day.

Frequently Asked Question

How do I remove Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint without irritating my lips?

To gently remove your Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30, apply a small amount of oil-based makeup remover to a cotton pad and press it against your lips for 15-20 seconds. This will break down the long-wearing formula without excessive rubbing. Follow with a hydrating lip balm to restore moisture. For stubborn residue, try our Instyle Gentle Makeup Remover specifically formulated for long-wearing cosmetics.

Complete your look with our bestselling Instyle Volumizing Mascara and Instyle HD Foundation for a flawless finish that lasts as long as your lip color. Experience the difference that premium formulation makes with Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30 today!
short_description: Experience intense color with Instyle Extreme Matte Lip Paint - N 30. This long-lasting, transfer-proof formula delivers rich mauve pigment with a comfortable matte finish that stays put for up to 12 hours.
